pr_title: Handle exceptions during scheduled cache cleanup

timeline.author: tharindu-bandara

timeline.message: Handle exceptions during scheduled cache cleanup

timeline.bodyText: Since we are consuming the exception, shall we add an error log? We can skip adding the exception in the error log, but in the debug log as this code does.
timeline.author: tharindu-bandara

replies.bodyText: This a scheduled task that will run every 30 seconds. If we add an error log, it will print the error logs unnecessarily.
replies.author: pamodaaw

timeline.bodyText: We can omit this catch block and just catch the throwable?
timeline.author: tharindu-bandara

replies.bodyText: The log level of each of the catch clauses is different. Therefore we cannot handle IllegalStateException from the catch block of Throwable
replies.author: pamodaaw

timeline.message: Handle exceptions during scheduled cache cleanup
